title: S&P 500 Hits Record on Technology Gains Ahead of Fed Meeting
description: Gains in technology stocks helped push the S&P 500 Index to its first record in more than two weeks ahead of the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision on Wednesday.
content: Gains in technology stocks helped push the S&P 500 Index to its first record in more than two weeks ahead of the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision on Wednesday.
